meaning_str.bing:
adj. 美丽的；风和日丽的；出色的
网络. 漂亮的；美的；美好的

美丽的；风和日丽的；出色的

美丽的；漂亮的；优美的；美好的；很好的；出色的；极好的；完美的；绝妙的；巧妙的；令人愉快的；赏心悦目的

sogou-kaoyan.adj: 美丽的; 美好的[出现5次)];很好的; 出色的[出现0次)]

sogou-CET6.adj: 漂亮的[出现6次)];极好的[出现0次)]

sogou-CET4.adj: 漂亮的[出现5次)];极好的[出现2次)]

sogou-gaokao.adj: 漂亮的[出现5次)];极好的[出现2次)]

sogou-zhongkao.adj: 漂亮的; 美好的[出现293次)];极好的; 出色的[出现4次)]

1.en: Back then, I told you I will work hard to support you, to have a marvelous wedding with you and put on a lovely ring on your beautiful hand.
1.cn: 我以前对你说过，要为你奋斗，养你一辈子，为你办风光的婚礼，为你戴上美丽的戒指。

2.en: On his way home from the hospital he bought some beautiful flowers in a shop.
2.cn: 就在回家途中从医院，他买了一些美丽的鲜花在一间店铺。

3.en: Now Wang Qiong Telecommunications Bureau in Wuhan to work colleagues have called her a "beautiful did not speak. "
3.cn: 现在的王琼在武汉市电信局工作，同事们都称她为“美丽不说话”。

0.cn: 因为那是…那是美丽的一天。

1.cn: 美丽的事情是不喜欢被吸引的。

2.en: Phoebe, all babies are beautiful. Oh, okay.
2.cn: 哦，菲比，所有孩子都是美丽的！好吧。

3.en: All right. Now you go get that beautiful pig.
3.cn: 去撂倒那只美丽的猪吧。

4.en: Oh, hey. Dune. Not a great movie, but look at that beautiful desert.
4.cn: 喔，是《沙丘》。不算是个好电影，但看看这美丽的沙漠啊。

5.en: Howie? Hey, there's my beautiful bride! Can you see me? I can. How are you?
5.cn: 华仔。我美丽的新娘子，你可以看见我吗？可以，你还好吗？

6.en: Okay. On it! All right. Big… You call me turkey... beautiful, brown eyes. Better.
6.cn: 好的。马上去。好的。大大的…你要是敢叫我大号火鸡... 有着美丽的棕色眼睛。好多了。

7.en: I do dote on her. I was quite in raptures at her beautiful little design for a table.
7.cn: 我太喜爱她了，她寄来给我装饰桌子的那张美丽的小图案我真喜欢极了。

8.en: And when we eventually ran out of creatures to dominate, we built this beautiful place.
8.cn: 而当我们最终没有新生物能支配的时候，我们建造了这个美丽的地方。

9.en: It's a baby. A beautiful little baby. And some other stuff I'm gonna pretend I don't see.
9.cn: 婴儿！美丽的小婴儿！还有点其他东西我就装没看见吧！

10.en: Oh, come on. Childbirth is a natural, beautiful... Oh, it's like someone sawed a cow in half.
10.cn: 拜托，分娩是一个自然而又美丽的... 就像一头牛被人锯成了两半。

11.en: Once upon a time, there was a beautiful tiger. She lived in a cave with the rest of her family.
11.cn: 很久以前 有只美丽的小老虎, 她和家人一起住在山洞里。

12.en: Oh, I feel very lucky, she's great. I think she's the most beautiful woman I've ever seen. Thank you.
12.cn: 我觉得自己很幸运，她太棒了。她是最美丽的女人。谢谢你。

13.en: On the one hand, you can sugarcoat it, the way they do in movies and romance novels where beautiful people learn beautiful lessons where nothing is too messed up that can't be fixed with an apology and a Peter Gabriel song.
13.cn: 一种方式是，你可以美化它。就像电影和言情小说里一样，美丽的人物接受着美丽的考验，而那些考验都可以用一声抱歉和一首彼得·盖布瑞尔的歌解决。

14.en: And I hope she'll be a fool. That's the best thing a girl in this world can be. A beautiful little fool.
14.cn: 我希望她做个傻姑娘，傻姑娘才是最幸福的，美丽的傻姑娘。

15.en: Only, only I won't say hooked up. I'll say, "Began their beautiful journey…" There you go. "…by doing it."
15.cn: 我不会说“搞在一起”，我会说：他们美丽的旅程。对了。由“做了”开始。

16.en: Once upon a time, there was a beautiful young girl who married for love. And she had two loving daughters.
16.cn: 从前，有一个美丽的年轻女孩嫁给了自己心爱之人。她有两个可爱的女儿。

17.en: There's a boy. a bean stalk. a beautiful princess. a brave knight. and a cook who makes the lovely dinner.
17.cn: 有一个男孩，还有一颗豆茎，以及一位美丽的公主。勇敢的骑士，还有会做美味食物的厨师。

18.en: Why are you so scared? Any woman would be so lucky to look into those beautiful eyes and listen to that sweet voice.
18.cn: 你为什么这么害怕？能看到你那双美丽的眼睛，听到你甜美声音的女人是多么的幸运。

19.en: So, I'm gonna need to have that back. But, in exchange I'm willing to trade you this beautiful, more expensive ring.
19.cn: 不过我愿意拿这枚美丽的，更昂贵的戒指和你交换。
